# Active Dashboards (SY21-22)

<br>

All dashboards will require an @teachinglab.org email login to verify that access to the correct content is granted.

<br>

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)
# bs4cards::use_strapless(here::here("css"))
galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  long_name = c("Facilitator End of Session Survey Dashboard",
                "End of Session Surveys 2021-2022",
                "End of Course Surveys 2021-2022", 
                "Survey Responses per Partner",
                "Coaching Participant Feedback 2022"),
  blurb = c("A dashboard for TL facilitators, that provides just their indiviudal data based on email login.",
            "A dashboard to explore responses given at the end of each session for full time TL employees.", 
            "A dashboard to explore responses to the surveys given at the end of courses.", 
            "A simple table and time series graph for live diagnostic survey responses per partner.",
            "A dashboard to explore responses to the coaching participant feedback survey."),
  date = c(Sys.Date(), Sys.Date(), Sys.Date(), Sys.Date(), Sys.Date()),
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Dashboards/FacilitatorPersonalDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/SessionDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/CourseDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/DiagnosticResponses.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/DiagnosticResponses.png")),
  link = c("https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/PersonalFacilitator/",
           "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/SessionSurvey/",
           "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/CourseSurvey/",
           "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/DiagnosticComplete/",
           "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/CoachingParticipantFeedback/")
)

galleries |>
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    footer = paste("updated on", date),
    layout = "label-below", 
    width = 2, 
    spacing = 3
  )
```

<br>

# Visualizations

<br>

```{r echo = F}
time_diff <- Sys.Date() - as.Date("2019-01-01")
year_diff <- round(as.numeric(time_diff)/365)
galleries3 <- tibble::tibble(
  long_name = c("Visualizing and textualizing TL data.",
                "How much does each US state spend per kid per capita over time?"),
  blurb = c(paste0("A visualization of ", year_diff, " years of reviews of Teaching Lab courses by type of content."),
            ""),
  date = c(Sys.Date(), Sys.Date()),
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Visualizations/Reviews.png"),
                here::here("Images/Visualizations/SpendingperKid.png")),
  link = c("https://teachinglab.github.io/TLReviews.html",
           "https://teachinglab.github.io/USStateSpendingperKid.html")
)

galleries3 |>
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    footer = paste("updated on", date),
    layout = "label-below", 
    width = 2
  )
```
